name: Marcelo Fiore
content: Marcelo Fiore Marcelo Fiore Professor in Mathematical Foundations of Computer Science, Department of Computer Science and Technology, University of Cambridge Fellow of Christ's College Research Interests: Mathematical models of computation; denotational and operational semantics of programming languages and interactive systems; type systems and program logics for functional and concurrent computation; applications of category theory to computer science. Book: Axiomatic Domain Theory in Categories of Partial Maps. Cambridge University Press, Distinguished Dissertations in Computer Science, 1996. Papers and talks: Latest Collection Algebra Concurrency Domains PreSheaves Types Rough Notes. Teaching Undergraduate: Discrete Mathematics. Denotational Semantics. Postgraduate: Advanced Topics in Denotational Semantics.
